Sorry Streaming-chan, but I'm playing to win!

Hey, Tomoko. How do you feel about explosions?

But of course! Fufufufu! I'm glad you understand, Stella! I am the foremost genius among the Crimson Demons, I shall not fall to something like this!
I have no idea what you are talking about. I had no obligations to anyone important. No one worth remembering that is.
Of course! Explosion magic is a way of life! Just saying I like it is an understatement! It's the reason for my existence!
I-it's not like it's something I put that much thought into... Definitely not trying to overcompensate. Nope.
If I were to cast a spell here, you all would likely die or be severely injured in the explosion!
I mean, there may be someone I like... He's quite the reliable person despite being a bit scummy... He's a member of my party.
I mean, there may be someone I like... But that's between me and him...
C-cute?! I'll have you know I am a fearsome wielder of dangerous magic!... Although I appreciate the compliment... I don't know what you mean by physicality however.
Who are you calling inexperienced!? I'll have you know I have plenty of experience! And don't go acting like I'm a kid alright?! I'm an adult, got it?!
There is no such thing as an accidental explosion! Every explosion is a finely crafted masterpiece! There are few people in the world who can withstand an explosion and you don't seem sturdy enough.
Are you trying to say something about my outfit!? Each piece of clothing has been carefully selected to best contain my overwhelming magical power!... Plus I like the way it looks...
I don't need any advantage against you! I could beat you in my sleep! I'll show you!
P-Pretty?... Geez, I don't know whether to be happy for the compliment or be worried you are some kind of perverted deviant...
That's easy for you to say, not everyone is comfortable being nude like you! Oh Eris how did I end up in this situation...
U-um... yeah, sure! That's it! It's not like I just thought they looked cool... haha...

T-the floor is just cold, okay?!
You take that back! I look nothing like that loser!
S-shut up, I know that! You stupid useless pervert...
I-I'm not cute! Who are you calling cute?! Don't you dare talk down to me!
I'm 18! I'm not young! I'm an adult!
Go down?... I'm not sure I follow what you mean. Is it some kind of bonding activity, like a girl's night out?

I'd obviously blow up the hundred phallus horses! Why would that first part even be an option?!

I-I'm not quite sure what that means... I do like winning however, not sure if that answers your question.
Why are you curious about how well I sleep?... Oh wait, you mean... Wait why would you ask that!?
What?! Er, I mean, wait WHAT?! I-I don't know how to respond to that! I didn't think this was a weird sex bar, is it?!

Oh! Er, of course! Yes, I know many talents! Not because I'm easy, but because I'm so mature!
I must confess I've never done anything quite like this before...

I-I'm not worried! You're worried! I-I can handle something as simple as this!...

Don't fret, Amy! I will most certainly walk away from this the winner! That being said, I appreciate your concern.
I'm still in the game, Amy! Don't do anything so drastic until you can feel the darkness enveloping you!
Wh-What do you mean 'just breasts'!? Of course that's a big deal! It's a REALLY big deal! N-Not that I'm scared or anything!

Wh-What? But I haven't even done anything yet! I'm still deciding what to take off!
Oh... lucky me... That's exactly what I was hoping for, Panty.
Gah! I don't want to know what's going through Panty's head right now!
I would be more than happy to teach you the art of reducing your enemies to craters, Tharja! It gives me the perfect excuse to blow something up!
I'm still not really sure what you are talking about, Saki. I find you quite confusing.
It's not a wizard costume! I'm an Arch Wizard! I'm also a master of Explosion magic of course!
And just what might that irony be, Mary? Choose your words carefully.
I'm no mere mage. I'm an Arch Wizard, and top of my class at that. You're looking at the foremost genius of the Crimson Demons!
A meteor is just an explosion with a useless rock in the middle! Why would I want to learn THAT?
Why thank you, your outfit is quite spectacular as well! You would fit in quite well at my village!
Don't lump me in the same boat as a pervert like you, Darkness!
You really don't have any shame, Darkness, do you?

I'm happy to know you are willing to throw away your pride for your most valuable party member, Darkness, however I would never resort to something so low. Especially since everyone is looking!
I have my pride as the foremost genius among Crimson Demon's to uphold!

Really?! I must find a mirror and see! I knew I was feeling a bit taller lately! Fufufu, it seems my time has come at last! Now everyone will tremble before my overwhelming maturity! I always knew you were very observant, Darkness!

W-What do you mean, pretend!? Do you doubt my legitimacy as a Crimson Demon? We who even the Demon King himself fears? I am Megumin, first in her class and the foremost genius among the Crimson Demons!
Indeed, strange knife wielding woman, there is nothing quite like incinerating your foes in a horrible explosion of hellfire! And don't even get me started on the feeling of the shockwave afterwards!

I'm glad you asked, quiet girl with the convenient notecards! The Crimson Demons are a clan of people who all possess an inherently strong magical potential. We are the most fearsome mages in all of Belzerg, and I happen to be the foremost genius of the Crimson Demons!
A-Adorable?! I'll have you know I am quite dangerous and powerful. Also, I'm an Arch Wizard, not a witch!
I-I'm well aware of my height, thank you very much! Didn't you ever learn that it's not appropriate to mention a woman's size?!
As long as it's not 'crazy explosion girl' or something of that sort, I don't see why not...

There may be plenty of adventurers where I'm from, but someone like me is a rare thing indeed! Few ever reach the pinnacle of Arch Wizard. I am a member of the Crimson Demons, a clan whose members all exhibit exceptional magic proficiency and who all have the capability of being Arch Wizards.

I would prefer to be the best in the world instead of wasting my time spreading myself thin. I have devoted myself to Explosion and its magnificence, to go where no Explosion has gone before! One day my name will come to mind whenever Explosion is mentioned, and thus, in a way, I will become one with the spell!
I am no one's servant! He wouldn't last a day without me!

I don't love demons, Saki. I've been inconvenienced by a fair number of them myself. As for your question, I think everyone in my group respects magic, but I doubt you will find any of them who like demons, especially Aqua. When Aqua sees a demon or undead she instantly tries to kill it.
I do, and as a matter of fact, I already told them how I feel. They are too chicken to do anything about it, but it’s endearing in a way.
The bra part I'm used to, but without any panties on? T-That's quite bold!

Don’t get the wrong idea and think of me as some hopeless romantic, Saki. I am destruction incarnate.

Why, that is simply because we are a passionate and powerful as demons! I can be especially fiendish if enough experience is involved.
I'll have you know I'm a fully fledged adult, and not some adorable and naive school girl, Jura! My size is merely a side effect of my immense power!

Yu mast saccumb ta dah fahleengs ah aweeken enside yu, Ahmi.
Bitch, you'll take it if I tell you to.

I don't know what this genetic modification is, but I have Crimson Demon blood coursing through my veins!

Anything that isn't Explosion magic is beneath me! I don't waste my time on anything that isn't the wondrous art of Explosion!
I'm not sure what kind of advice you mean, but I suppose there's no reason to turn you down. I must say, I'm intrigued what kind of things people would normally hide from me.
I-I would say it's perfectly natural to be embarrassed about showing something so private! If anything, you are the weird one!

I happen to have a cat of my own. His name is Chomusuke. He's a black cat with very odd, but very cool markings.

Magic doesn't quite work that way. I need to allocate skill points into a spell to use it, and I'm limited to spells and skills that an Arch-Wizard can learn. There is no maturity spell that I'm aware of.
S-Sexy? Just imagining something like that is incredibly embarrassing... I-It's not like I'm trying to impress anyone here or anything...
Heh, I have a feeling Kazuma would like that joke, Tomoko. Thanks for at least helping to keep my mind off of the embarrassing situation.
I... I apologize, Pyrrha. I'm used to people's first reaction being to call me a child. I'm here because I was hoping to learn more about games from the country of one of my party members.
I'm not actually a dark diety of destruction, that just felt like the appropriate response to your question.
Of course they are. I would be a poor example of a Crimson Demon if I destroyed my allies. Although there was that one time... oh, don't worry, he's fine now.

It's mostly used for making everyday jobs and chores easier, such as farming or cooking, or defending the village. We also make the best magical goods you'll find anywhere. Outside of that, you will mostly see people using their immense power to try and look as cool as possible, as is tradition.
I wouldn't say that either... Usually the others end up getting us in trouble, one way or another. I, however, NEVER get us in trouble.
I was joking, Pyrrha. Just what kind of person do you think I am? I do my best to avoid blowing up random people. I usually practice far outside the cities where no one lives.

Well, Pyrrha, the tomb of the dark god is, quite simply, exactly what it sounds like. We have an ancient dark god sealed away there, and we give tours of the tomb. We don't get many people interested in seeing it for some reason though.
(This conversation is at least helping me keep my mind off what I'm doing...) I haven't had to worry about food ever since I joined my current party, so I'm always willing to try less filling things.
Fufufu... I can't blame you for noticing my powerful and intimidating aura, Ping.
Fufufu... I can't blame you for noticing my powerful and intimidating aura, Mulan.
I'm no witch, I'm an Arch Wizard. I travel Belzerg with the rest of my party and make monsters explode into millions of pieces. My Explosion magic is feared and respected everywhere.
Don't go acting like you're better than me, I'd like to see how you'd react to being constantly treated like a kid! It's not fun, okay? I'm never taken seriously unless I blow something up.
That's rich. The only one worse than you is our dear Kazuma.
I've known you for a long time, Darkness. You may be plenty of things, but shameful is not one of them.
You try and act noble, Darkness, but I know the real reason you are offering such a thing is because you are a hopeless pervert. Me and my beautiful explosions will have no part in your delusions.
W-Wait what?! How dare you play with a young woman's heart like that! I take back everything I said, your skills in observation are only bested by your skill in hitting your targets!
Right then... I suppose I shall forgive you. My magic is explosion magic, I have learned how to destroy all my foes with one devastating blast.
No, No, I am equally frustrated by those as well... The women in my family are cursed with smaller frames...
Crimson Demons can master any magic they wish. When a group of them fight together, it's quite a spectacular light show!
I just got shivers from that first one for some reason... But I suppose either will work. You can also call me 'supreme lord of destruction' if you so like.
I suppose if you are calling me a witch in admiration, Neptune, then it isn't the biggest problem. Just remember, I'm one of the greatest classes of magic users! I'm not some ordinary magician!
What?! No of course not! My Explosion magic is beautiful! My body tingles with excitement every time I cast it! It is the most wonderful feeling in the world!
I may be small but I can easily blow anyone away!
Neither! My answer is neither! How do these invisible people know so much about me?!
I'm the better wizard! Me! What do you mean by real magic?! She is some useless no one with fat cow boobs!
Hmph, I would appreciate you not to patronize me. I'm an Arch Wizard in a party of adventurers. I go around exploding monsters and villains for coin and prestige!
I already told you! I'm an Arch Wizard! Why are you treating me like some child making up stories?!
Watch out, villains of the world. There is a new and terrifying menace about to be unleashed! Thank you Yuelia!
I-I apologize... People sometimes treat me like a kid or something for some reason. It can get quite infuriating. Usually they are more respectful once they've seen me blow something up.

One of the most notable traits of a Crimson Demon is our Crimson eyes that burn brighter as our passion increases! Our outfits may vary wildly, but I feel as though my current clothes are a decent example. We are also known for being very confidant and mysterious!
I suppose to each their own. Whether I am destroying an enemy or a hillside, an explosion is equally magnificent.
C-Cringey?! Cheapo?! I'll have you know this is how all Crimson Demons talk and dress! It's not cringey at all!... Is it?...
W-well two can play at that game, Kazuma! And I thought you claimed to be the mature one!
Liar! Y-you never played with her! You never played with her right?! Right?!
Chunchunmaru is an excellent name, you just have no taste.
I'M WAY MORE MATURE THAN HER!
(Was he really looking at me?...)
Don't you dare!
I still have feelings you idiot! This is really embarrassing!
Unlike some stupid card, I'm actually a real Arch Wizard. Call me garbage at your own peril!
I'll let that cute witch remark slide for now... I'm an adventurer and an Arch Wizard. I travel with my party and obliterate monsters and evil-doers for a living!
I don't know who this Dorothy is, but I don't care for that look you are giving me!
W-wait! You are talking about two girls kissing each other?! N-no, I've never done something so scandalous!

*gulp* I suddenly feel like I'm in a Beginner's Bane den...
T-they aren't tiny! And they wouldn't distract anyone anyways...
Believe me... I know... We have a Crusader in our party who's a massive pervert.

No, I don't enjoy being patronized by older people. I'm an adult, got it?! I have a hard enough time already getting people to understand that.
I-I fail to see why we need to talk about such subjects to prove our maturity...
Oh... Um... Well, thank you, but I'm not some cute little girl dressing up... and this is not a costume, for you see, I am an Arch Wizard.

I have burned countless foes from the face of this world in my all consuming blaze of destruction, including many generals of the Demon King himself! My legendary power is known by all kingdoms!

Ah yes, that makes sense. Though not always the case, nobility and the like tend to prefer to leave the fighting to others, Is that not correct?

Why didn't you take that off first?! Are you even trying to win or do you just get off on this?...
L-Let's not test that out, shall we?!
I knew it, my intuition is quite powerful! Although I've never heard of a 'Vault Hunter' before. Do you raid ancient and forbidden temples for valuable artifacts?

Fufufufu! I'd like to see you try! I am the foremost master of explosion magic among the Crimson Demons, none can withstand my explosive might! Many have trembled in fear before me and begged for mercy!
Well, for starters, you would need something dark and foreboding, like black leather fingerless gloves, or perhaps a crimson cape with arcane symbols!
I probably should have seen that coming...
I could see about showing you an easy trade route for, say, a portion of your profits if you are interested... Unless of course you want to defend your caravans against One Punch Bears.
If you keep going around claiming to be a goddess you will end up in big trouble. I've seen it happen many times before.
A general of the demon king?!?
I can understand being attached to your clothing... I quite like my hat as well...
I wonder if her head will fall off. That would certainly be interesting!
You can be both cute and functional, Natsuki, just look at me!
Even the smallest garments can hold untold power, Natsuki!
(She is so confident, it's kind of empowering... But I'm not a pervert so I'd never act like that!)
I'll never understand why you chose to wear such painful looking things...
I have respect for the mismatching shoes. As you can tell, I use a similar look with my stocking!
Why would you wear something that makes it hard to hear on purpose?... What are those?
I do hope you have more clothes on than you appear to have...
Why are you so worried about your gauntlets?! Your big fat boobs are already flopping around!
Wait where did your hat go?!
Oh, I'm sure Wiz would be very interested in an item like that. She runs a magic shop back where I'm from.
It's okay, Haru. Starting with the smallest items is the most strategic move. Anyone who complains about it clearly doesn't understand strategy.
It seems to me that your staff was quite faulty. You should really be more careful with where you get them, L'Arachel. I can give you advice on where to find the best ones, if you'd like.
Are you some kind of demon? I happen to know a powerful one who runs a shop near where I live, although he is nothing but trouble...
Are you some kind of nobility? I've had experience dealing with them, they are quite strange.
Your laziness reminds me of a certain someone in my own party...
So you are a healer of some sort, correct? Perhaps our party's Arch Priest could learn a thing or two from you...
You may be smart, but you weren't smart enough to win against me!
You may possess sharp wit, but humor will do you no good when faced against a Crimson Demon!
You look to be a capable fighter. I wish our Crusader could learn to be more than a glorified meat shield...
Your cute charms have no effect on me! I shall strike you down with no mercy!
Do you happen to know a Li- I mean, a person named Wiz? She is quite knowledgeable about the undead.
Hey... You wouldn't happen to know where I could get some alcohol of my own? Kazuma never let's me drink any, even though I'm old enough in Belzerg.
Better things to do?! What the heck is that supposed to mean?!
S-Silly?! There's nothing silly about the beauty of explosions, Maki!

Is it normal for people around here to talk like this? It's vulgar...
I feel like I should be covering my ears or something...
I don't get it... I-I mean! Yes of course, I know what Panty is talking about.
(What's a strap-on?...)
All this perverted talk is making me feel weird...
I feel like you have something to say about my outfit, Erufuda. I suggest you avoid insulting a Crimson Demon, for even the Demon King himself is terrified of our immense power.
People are into socks too?! Is nothing sacred?!
People are into socks?... I swear, perverts are incredibly strange...
Why do your hands often get wet? Is it related to your job?
Bare hands? Is that really something people are into?...
What were you doing that got your hands dirty?
I would seriously reconsider using those socks...
You should try wearing just one like me!
Bare hands?! People are really into that?! What the heck is up with that?!
Do people seriously find socks attractive?! You must be joking, is that really a thing?!
I assure you I have tried everything, Revy. I'm 18 years old, but I am constantly mistaken for a child. I swear it's some kind of curse...
If only it were that easy, Revy. I'm 18, yet I keep getting mistaken for a kid. And I assure you, my outfit is quite normal where I grew up. It's no costume.
I-I see. I suppose that would be a positive way to look at it. I'll keep that in mind. ..
I suppose, in regards to my height, as long as it's not an insult there's no point in denying the truth of the matter... I'm sure they are lucky to have you, Revy.
Of course not, Revy. I may know a few nobles who are good, but there are certainly plenty of slimy ones too. They think they are great, but those particular nobles are quite pathetic.
Oh, so you have a sister, Revy? And she runs an inn?
Oh, so you have a sister, Revy? And she runs an inn?
I-I assure you it is completely a love for the art of explosions, nothing more!
I assure you I have only blown myself up once, or maybe twice. No more than that!
O-Oh yes, now I remember. Right. The Beretta is truly a formidable firework-based weapon.
O-Oh! Of course, yes. Chunka medal. That was silly of me to forget.
Er, um, of course I have?... Y-Yes, that's right.
I-I promise I'm not acting! Now I'm regretting not asking Kazuma more about these things...
Y-You're right, I apologize Revy. I never had much exposure to that kind of stuff before, outside of the occasional antics of Kazuma or Darkness. I will try to act more, er, mature.
(*Gulp*) Y-Yes, I suppose that is correct... You make a good point. I'm in this situation, after all. I should try to be a bit more, er, mature.
I'll have you know I've already graduated from schooling, Revy. There are no middle-schoolers here, although I suppose I'll have to 'school' you in this game!
I'll have you know I've already graduated from schooling, Revy. There are no middle-schoolers here, although I suppose I was 'schooled' in this game...
You can keep insisting I'm a kid, Revy, but my maturity should speak for itself by now.

Don't point that thing at me! I'm well aware I can't cast Explosion on you, but it's not because of distance. I have no fear of my beautiful explosions. I already cast explosion earlier today, so I have to wait until tomorrow.
N-Noodle arms?! I was talking about how I might accidentally blow everyone up, do I really have noodle arms?!
No profession? If you aren't careful about that, Neptune, you may end up a lazy low life like a certain someone I know. Find something you're passionate about and then demand people pay you for it!
You are rather 'happy go lucky', so to speak. That isn't a bad thing at all, though. Just be careful no one tries to trick you or something!
You like to listen to something in the background? I'm not sure I follow, Elesa. What do those things do?
Wh-What are you, some kind of fruity vampire?!
Yeah, sure. A gardener of the souls of the damned maybe.
I hope his father isn't a complete disappointment of a demon like a certain other demon I know...
Oh, and here I thought we were being serious for a moment, Yuelia. You sound like someone from my village.
Not another one. Look, I won't judge you. My friend thinks she's a goddess. Just be careful, you can get in a lot of trouble spouting delusions like that.
How romantic, although aren't you a little old to be treating your parents like deities, Yuelia?
Right, right. Well, Yuelia, upon the day I cast my first Explosion, I too brought the world a gift. That would be the gift of destruction!
You have already pretty much taken everything off. It's not like you are leaving much to the imagination...
R-Right, that's good to- Wait you are going to do what to me?!
Wait, birthday parties? I fail to see the connection here...
AHHHHH!!! You're adorable!!!! er... I-I mean you look like a powerful magical familiar!... Can I touch them...?
Oh I'm sure you'll be losing a lot more, Cynthia. After all, I am your opponent!
I-I'm not sure that's a record to be proud of...
A smart and tactical decision. Well played.
Do your gloves perhaps restrain your powerful innate magic? Or perhaps they are a dark artifact of some kind.
I swear I thought I saw blood on those gloves... You look like you could give Darkness a run for her money!
Those are some rather rugged looking boots. Are you an adventurer perhaps?
I'm sure you've had a lot of practice kicking people with those boots!
I bet getting kicked by those boots would hurt a lot!
I meant to ask about those things you are holding. Are they some kind of magical weapon perhaps?
Those doodads you kept in that sheath. What do they do?
I've never seen anything like those before... I must say I'm curious.
It appears you've been disarmed. A dangerous position to be in during a competition!
Those seemed neat but they probably can't compare to my Explosion magic! It's probably best you got rid of them!
Luckily I still have my staff!
Wait, YOU'RE a pirate?! Seriously?! You look nothing like a pirate!
Right then, on to the next hand so I can win again!
I'm ashamed that you lasted longer than I did...
Your hair is quite pretty. You shouldn't cover it up with those things on your head.
They sound impressive, I should consider making flame proof clothes...
Why are you handicapping yourself?
Is your maid some kind of clothes stealing wizard?...
We should use that as a trophy for the winner! ... Oh, I see, Arash. I suppose I would feel the same in their shoes...
I claim that as my trophy if I win!... Er, Yes I suppose that is correct, Arash. I just got a bit excited...
Did that have some kind of magic charm on it?
Surely, that was important and you aren't just stalling, right?
I have claimed another trinket with this victory!
One step closer to victory.
One small step for man, one giant leap for the Crimson Demons!
Too bad we are not playing for keeps, or I would claim that as mine.
We should use that as a trophy for the winner!
I claim that as my trophy if I win!
That trinket seems like the perfect prize for the winner!
At least I don't have to worry about my pants falling down without my belt.
Fufufu... It seems my opponent has been blinded!
Your strange ear warmers are now another casualty of this fight, it would seem.
Was that a magic charm?
Surely, that was important and you aren't just stalling, right?
Your baubles are pointless here, it's wise to surrender them.
One step closer to defeat.
She still has more to go. Make sure you don't stop whittling her down everyone.

E-Exploding clothes?! What beautiful magic is this?!
You should embrace it, Elesa! Intimidating is both cool, and attractive!... Or at least so I've heard...
Akko, do you know of any spells, perhaps, that could make Kazuma less of a hopeless pervert?
I'm not sure I believe in this "precious treasure" nonsense, but they certainly look good! May I try one?
I suppose we shall see about that, Cynthia!
Hm, that makes sense, although I suppose wearing two layers of underwear would be useful in a game like this...
I see, I suppose it is worth mild discomfort for a strategic advantage. I underestimated you, Cynthia!

I see. My party is rather good at getting out of trouble as well! Although it's usually one of my companions faults that we got in trouble in the first place. I, however, NEVER cause trouble for the party!
I see my Crimson Demon intuition wasn't wrong. I may not be fast, but none hit harder than I do! Perhaps we should have a contest sometime and see which of us can 'go the hardest' as you say.
The feeling of immense power rushing through your body, culminating in a single point before obliterating everything in front of you in a deafening roar! It's a feeling I can't live without!
I don't know. She is quite useful at times, but she also believes she's a literal goddess.
Indeed! Why, without a cape, how would I make a dramatic entrance or pull it over myself mysteriously?
Right! Although I only understood some of those words, I can tell you DO understand! I like you, PA-15!
Hm, Hm, I see you have been taught well! Your friends sound very wise indeed!

Whatever word you use, it doesn't change it's function as a desolate place with minimal complaints from earth rattling explosions. I, er, will howevr require you to carry me afterwards. The spell is quite draining and renders me immobile for a while.
Well then, let us see if being in your element is enough to claim victory as yours!
Exactly! Ah, it's so refreshing to meet someone who understands! You have increased your standing with me, Neptune!
Ah, yes, a goddess. Of course. I'm not sure if you are aware, but in a past life I was an awesome and terrifying force of destruction!
Your head comes off just like Beldia! That's really awesome! I would make sure no one takes your head from you, and also stay away from our party Arch Priest for that matter...
Pockets? I never considered that...
They were indeed unneeded, Haru. For you see, my victory is all but assured! Give up now while you still have the chance!
I imagine it is very hard to keep white clean. Red and black are superior colors!
Paid? Are you some sort of stripper? I don't remember any money being involved. Although I suppose having fun is indeed important...
Why you!... I believe you are mistaken, as I am not round like a dwarf as you are! Hmph.
W-What the?! You can transform?! I'm so jealous right now!
I have no problem with how you run your business, Anna, as long as you don't try to rip me off. Do that, and you might have to get explosion insurance!
Hang in there Natsuki, It's just a minor blow!
Don't worry, Natsuki, I'll win for the both of us!
Natsuki! Your armor is weakening!
Why do I feel bad about this...
OOooOOH!!! What impressive form!
I have to admit, while your style is a little flashy, I can still respect it.
Fufufu! Your arrogance will cost you greatly, Remilia!
You have a good sense of style, Tomoko, although I think you should try the uneven stocking style, like me. It would look good on you.
Your energy is firing me up, Tomoko! I may just stop going easy on you!
Hey, Haru, how old are you exactly? If you don't mind me asking, that is.
Wh-Where did that thing come from, and why does it have no legs?!

~target~ kind of gives me the creeps...
How do you even get your hair to stay like that? It's like it's defying gravity.
I've never seen skin like that before... It really surprised me when I first saw you.
That tattoo is so cool! Maybe I should also get one!
Alright, Maki, I tried to be nice. I think now I'll enjoy taking you out even more. You should be wary of the wrath of a Crimson Demon.
Are you making fun of me?! You may have won at cards, Maki, but I can destroy you any day with a single blast! Be wary of the wrath of a Crimson Demon!
A minor blow. I prefer bigger booms.
A small victory, but a victory nonetheless.
Take that!

Don't think you're better than me just because you lasted longer than me.

scene.name: intro text
scene.directive: In this epilogue there will be a red or green arrow in the top right corner.
When the red arrow is showing, there is an animation currently playing that hasn't finished playing yet.
When the green arrow is showing, either there is no animation or the current animation is looped and it is safe to continue.
